div.div: Wild boar population growth and beech masting.
div.p: (a) The effect of winter temperature on population growth rate (λ) in years after full or moderate mast (•, ···), and in years after mast failure (◦, ―). The horizontal dashed line indicates no change, i.e. λ = 1. (b) Probability of beech mast events in Austria from 1976 to 2013. Lines represent predicted values from binomial models (see Methods for details), shaded areas 95% confidence limits.
